descriptions.app_description: AI-powered Blogging Assistant for Telex. This integration helps users generate high-quality blog content effortlessly using AI, providing structure, creativity, and SEO optimization.

key_features: Generates high-quality blog content using AI in seconds.
Allows customization of tone and writing style.
Supports keyword-based content generation for SEO optimization.
Can create full articles, outlines, or summaries based on user input.

settings.label: webhook_url
settings.description: Provide your slack channel webhook url.
